channel.title: Help with sprites
channel.description: well i edited a npc for the colour dark green and now when i log in my server and go to chickens it freezes client why? can some1 help me plz

item.title: Help with sprites
item.dc:creator: @samanthapk samanthapk
item.description:
@samanthapk wrote:

lol i dont know ima give up on chicken i guess lol i tryed btw i used sprite editing tool and just like loading rscd file i change the chicken files from sprites.hml there a dark green colour and now when i go on my server it freezes client is there a colour list with the codes for colours i need to add t npc.hml and npc.rscd???

Read full topic

item.title: Help with sprites
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:3, topic:305153”][quote author=snoopy89 link=topic=401411.msg2974986#msg2974986 date=1254219878]
I don’t understand, did you do this to the sprites? because what I know they are coloured from the xml files.

Well you could have made several things wrong there. but search for a turtorial i made in the dev section and follow it then you wont get errors.
[/quote]

She/He wanted to make a multi-coloured chicken.[/quote]

Yea but there one problem for he/she, they are white for a reason. there 2-3 kind that uses the chicken image, change the image and you change all the chickens in game. unless you add new chicken image for the new ugly chicken.

Now try count how many chickens there are in my meanings, get a free ticket to disneyland.

Read full topic
